html:
8.13.17  4:44 am   how often do you actually go to new canaan?

     once

8.13.17  4:00 am   I love this page, but are you gonna spice it up one day? Maybe add a square somewhere? Or something crazy like squiggly lines.

     i actually just spiced it up recently

8.13.17  3:20 am   Was "sometimes i whatever" an actual recording of you while trying to think of something for a thursday video?

     yes!

8.13.17  3:13 am   What do you think about trees

     i think they are doing a great job

8.12.17  11:50 pm   Why do people constantly ask you about Waluigi?

     i am usually never asked about waluigi, except for yesterday, when i was asked about 25 questions about waluigi in rapid succession, presumably all by the same person unless it's some kind of huge coincidence

8.12.17  11:05 pm   Why do train conductors and orchestra conductors have the same title even though they have very different jobs?

     because they both conduct something

     Do you think this has ever caused any confusion in the "conductor" field of work? 

     those 2 conductors work in different fields

8.12.17  10:58 pm   would u ever release the memos for the songs you've written since you stopped writing songs on paper

     yes. i think it would be nice to put together behind-the-scenes videos for songs and videos

8.12.17  10:02 pm   Have you ever asked a question to yourself, and answered it?

     oh hell yeah. that's one of my most important techniques

8.12.17  8:37 pm   I'm a nihilist but I want to make music. How do I find the motivation?

     if you want to make music, then you are already motivated to make music. wanting to do something means you are motivated to do it. motivation means wanting to do it. that's what it means

8.12.17  7:42 pm   opinion or fact?

     question fragment

8.12.17  6:36 pm   I have a question, why does your "well it's not so hard to do" video wasn't uploaded to YouTube?

     back when i was first uploading some videos to youtube, there were only like 5 videos, and that was bringing the whole collection down

8.12.17  6:30 pm   which character from wizard of oz do you most identify with? 

     the yellow brick road

8.12.17  6:26 pm   would you date a girl who is autistic? 

     that sounds wonderful

8.12.17  2:53 pm   are all colors beautiful?

     yes

     does it depend on the context??

     yes

8.12.17  2:53 pm   are you ever gonna write songs in another language (not English)?

     i think that would be nice

      i feel like you mentioned wanting to do that in either the notebook or reality. that would be cool

8.12.17  11:46 am   so as i understand, you've been recording yourself way before editng it all into what is now the reality page, but since you did, did it change the way you record yourself, or talk to yourself as you know that someday we'll probably get to see/hear it ?

     i always planned to edit and release them, but after the first major round of editing (2016) i learned 2 things-- i changed the way i positioned the recorder so it doesn't vibrate so much, and i also started to repeat lines if there is like a horn honk or something

8.12.17  11:25 am   What makes the ueqstions page so damn addictive? 

     perhaps all the questions? that's just my best guess

8.12.17  10:56 am   what is something you can change?

     the future

8.12.17  10:23 am   Bill, Are you an elephant?

     no

8.12.17  9:41 am   I'm not seeing any new additions to the notebook. Are you still updating the notebook or is there a problem from my side?

     perhaps you are looking at the wrong part of the page

8.12.17  9:01 am   If every instrument is too much for one band, would you consider making it the Bill Wurtz Orchestra instead?

     currently more interested in the 5-10 piece range

8.12.17  8:53 am   I want to keep an audio/video journal, similar to yours. Could you give me some tips?

     just get a voice recorder and start doing it

8.12.17  8:23 am   For what purpose are crazy straws efficient?

     having a fun time

8.12.17  4:15 am   can you describe "history of the entire world, i guess"?

     that doesn't seem necessary, because the video is online for you see

8.12.17  2:06 am   What do you believe in?

     i have it written down somewhere

8.12.17  1:29 am   What are some relaxing activities you enjoy?

     victory, and success!

8.12.17  1:17 am   Are you a normie?

     no

8.11.17  11:58 pm   Which scale do you recommend for making sad/emotional song? 

     i really don't recommend using scales for making songs

8.11.17  11:24 pm   Why are people asking you more longer questions recently?

     they are not

8.11.17  11:09 pm   are lives worth living ?

     what else would they be worth

8.11.17  10:38 pm   Have you ever been able to hit a bird with your car?

     no

8.11.17  10:27 pm   will you press your songs on vinyl?

     that seems like a lot of work considering i've never met anyone who owns a record player

8.11.17  9:14 pm   How did you come up with the "its tonga time" jingle from history of the entire world I guess?

     that's actually just the first thing i played when i reached for the keyboard, as i was writing/demoing the script. here is the original clip. and the riff stayed in the temp track for the entire time, and then when i was finally doing the score, i used the exact same notes for the final

8.11.17  9:08 pm   hello, what's the first step in making a baby?

     thinking about babies

8.11.17  9:05 pm   why have you decided to tweet more than before?

     actually during most of 2014 and 2015 i was doing 4-5 tweets a day

8.11.17  9:00 pm   Do people in other countries call american music "world music"?

     i don't think so

8.11.17  8:30 pm   Are your reality videos scripted or improvised? 

     improvised, and heavily trimmed and cut down. also with added captions and graphics where needed

8.11.17  8:19 pm   why don't you update your notebook anymore?

     i do, but i respect your opinion

8.11.17  7:40 pm   is there a 100% content overlap between your tweets and the notebook?

     no

8.11.17  7:30 pm   what were you doing a year ago (11 August 2016)

     working on the writing and research for "history of the entire world, i guess"

8.11.17  7:27 pm   Hey, what do you call a chord made of stacked fourths? Like "C,F,Bb"? 

     i think the way you called it is great. if the bass is playing F, then you can go ahead and call it "Fsus4"... if the bass is playing Bb, you can go ahead and call it "Bbsus2" or even "Bbsus2, with Bb on top" or even "Bbsus2, in stacked fourths with Bb on top, ya know?".... if C is in the bass, you can safely call it C7sus4, although that is not entirely specific in how to play it, you might want to mention that there is no G, or perhaps say something like, "C7sus4, in stacked fourths like C, F, Bb, ya know?" i hope that makes sense

8.11.17  6:38 pm   what was the point in the "do you ever have sex?" line in "movie star"? it seemed out of place

     to keep it interesting
8.11.17  6:18 pm   Is this kind of question asked frequently enough that it gets a green link

8.11.17  4:27 pm   can you teach me how to love?

     i think you should try to do it in your own way

8.11.17  3:17 pm   i've always felt a bit odd. i'm an only child and got used to being by myself a lot pretty early, and i like it. but i also like being around people. problem is sometimes i feel awkward or don't know what to say. strangers especially just feel distant. and strange. i tried a thing where i try to find similarities between myself and a stranger. even if it's just "oh hey. i like their shoes. they must like their shoes too, or else they wouldn't be wearing them." or "oh, looks like they didn't brush their hair today. ha, me neither, man, me neither." it just makes me remember that we're all in the same boat. you got any neat tricks for blending in with the humans?

     i try to focus on the important details of our current reality. such as, if we are both stranded in the desert, i might say something like "i hope we can get out of this desert"

8.11.17  2:37 pm   I've been learning music by ear and if I come across a chord I don't know the name of, I tend to just associate it with the name of the song, composer, or whatever the name of the source I first learned the chord from. Do you do anything like this?

     yes

     Do I have to go back and relearn the proper name for each chord?

     the only reason to know names of chords is to communicate with other musicians about what you're doing, particulaly when working together. so the next time you're working with another musician, especially if that chord comes up, you could say, 'hey what do you call this chord? i call it blah blah' and they might say 'oh i think most people call that blah blah' so now you might try calling it that the next time you are in a collaborative or working setting, and when you are by yourself you can continue to call it what you want. OR they might say 'oh wow, i never had a name for that chord, i like the name you gave it, i think i will start calling it blah blah also'

8.11.17  2:31 pm   okay so i've got a case of what i've heard called "the everything thing." i'm obsessive and perfectionistic by nature. i can't remember a time when i wasn't aware of my own mortality and felt like there was a ticking timer on my life, and i had to just DO AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE. i go the extra 23094823 miles when i care about something. and there are plenty of things that i DON'T give two damns about, but there are SOOO MANY THINGS THAT I DO CARE ABOUT. and i see people who have put a shit ton of work into one of those things. like a successful musician. or a top tier pastry chef. or a talented painter. or a film editor, or blah blah blah a hundred other things I wanna be. and i'm like. shit. because i've hit that place where i'm so ready to put in the work, and i AM. like, between paying the bills and school i AM putting in the //work.// but it's so spread between all the Things that my progress in each of them is excruciatingly slow. i could pour myse lf into music and leave film and art and cooking and building things and agriculture and physics and everything else by the wayside, and i would probably progress faster and get to Play With the Big Kids sooner. but.... then i wouldn't have those other things in my life. or i could pursue all of them equally and maybe never break free from only being mediocre-to-good-ish at any of them. i don't wanna be presumptuous but i feel like you gotta know what i'm talking about. how do/did you deal with those feelings??? was/is the answer (in your experience) more focus, or just faith that you actually do have enough time in your lifetime to pour into everything you care about with an end result that you can be proud of? the only thing i know is that i can't let indecision hinder me any longer. 

     one thing that helps is to start keeping journals. a cohesive story line starts to come together, and it gives artistic weight and integrity to the struggle and journey itself, rather than just the individual elements

8.11.17  11:07 am   I'm trying to write my own music, and different melodies have been playing in my head for a while. What is the best way to get those on to paper? Whenever I try to score it, I forget the melody.

     i think nowadays the best way is to immediately record yourself singing the thing on a voice memo program or audio recording device. your phone probably has one. it's very important to get it down as soon as you think of it because you will forget it, because it's brand new and you've only just heard it for the first time

8.11.17  7:48 am   How do you write such tasty, complex sounding music? Like in history of japan, it sounds like you're doing quick key changes often. Is there any logic to that, or do you just kind of play whatever you think sounds good?

     i always do music based on the way it sounds

      Do you have any suggested reading that explains that stuff well?

     for learning music, i always recommend using your ears, not your eyes

     Sorry if this was asked before

8.11.17  5:30 am   why are you not answering my very serious waluigi questions? waaaaaaaaaaaah

     i did answer them, but i respect your opinion
